original_title: Holly Near: Singing for Our Lives
overview: A documentary revisiting the career of a feisty activist musician, who never quite achieved the same recognition as her similar contemporaries Joan Baez and Joni Mitchell.  Experience the power of song in the struggle for equality through the story of feminist singer and activist Holly Near, who for the last 40 years has worked on global social justice coalition-building in the womenâ€™s and lesbian movements.
title: Holly Near: Singing for Our Lives
